CustomField.formula: BCP_DCP_Number__c + ' - ' + Contact__r.FirstName + ' - ' + Contact__r.LastName + ' - ' + Contact__r.Phone + ' - ' + Contact__r.Email + ' - ' + Premises__r.vlocity_cmt__StreetAddress__c + ' - ' + Premises__r.vlocity_cmt__City__c + ' - ' + Premises__r.vlocity_cmt__State__c + ' - ' + Premises__r.vlocity_cmt__PostalCode__c + ' - ' + GST__r.Name + ' - ' + TEXT(ARTL_Standard_Reason__c)
CustomField.label: BCP/DCP Search String
